hero.description: Welcome to my digital hub. Here you'll find links to my latest projects, technical tutorials, and learning resources. I build things for the web and love sharing what I learn.

showcase.title: My Works
showcase.tech_blog_desc: Deep dives into Web Development, Nuxt, Modern Frontend Architecture, and cutting-edge tech trends.
showcase.teaching_desc: Empowering students to learn efficiently through digitalization and AI technology, helping teachers and parents track learning progress accurately.
showcase.cosmology_desc: Documentation of my summer internship at Academia Sinica, focusing on observing Cosmic Microwave Background Radiation (CMB) to understand how early universe Dark Matter affects cosmic evolution.
showcase.architecture_desc: Transforming architectural models into interactive experiences using Three.js, allowing users to deeply explore structure and functionality.
showcase.investment_desc: Records of my investment learning notes, analyzing and applying tools like stocks, bonds, futures, and options.
showcase.Physim_desc: PhysimHub is a platform that combines physics simulation and education, aiming to allow learners to explore the mysteries of the physical world more intuitively through interactive experiments and visualization tools.
showcase.tutoring_desc: Tutoring students in economics, physics and mathematics. Especially for the international AP exams and IB exams and Olympiad competitions preparation.
